entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is mentioned as the one who has been spying on Harry from the taps. She is described as wearing thick spectacles and having a miserable tone in her conversation with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who had a nasty feeling that Myrtle was spying on him from the taps. He is described as closing his eyes when he got into the bathroom and trying to make sure Myrtle couldn't see anything but his head.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who used to go into Myrtle's bathroom with him.

relationships.description: Harry suspects that Myrtle has been spying on him from the taps.
Ron is associated with Harry, who used to go into Myrtle's bathroom with him.
